meanings.definition: Consisting of two or more different polymers.
meanings.sent1: The copolymeric blend of plastics created a strong material.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the copolymeric properties of the new material.
meanings.sent3: The copolymeric mix-up in the lab led to a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a copolymeric masterpiece of various textures.
meanings.sent5: The copolymeric nature of the fabric made it ideal for different uses.

meanings.sent1: The researchers analyzed the copolymeric for its unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced copolymeric for various industries.
meanings.sent3: The copolymeric rolled off the conveyor belt, bouncing playfully.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a copolymeric of humor and seriousness.
meanings.sent5: The copolymeric was a puzzle of different elements waiting to be solved.
